Text.Page:
If we're going to stop the nexus attacks, we must learn what makes them possible. We've seen small boxes—teinocrons—carried by the intruders.

Kill nexus creatures and recover their teinocrons. We must have answers and those represent our best chance.

Oh, these will do. Yes, indeed.

Please accept my thanks. You're a credit to the Valkyon Federation, .
We must learn the true function of the nexus teinocrons. Please recover some for us.
